Agenda detail: Observer status for the Global Green Growth Institute in the General Assembly
cosponsored countries: Australia, Cambodia, Costa Rica, Denmark, Ethiopia, Guyana, Indonesia, Kiribati, Mexico, Mongolia, Montenegro, Norway, Palau, Papua New Guinea, Philippines, Poland, Qatar, Republic of Korea, Rwanda, Samoa, Slovenia, Switzerland, Turkey, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and Viet Nam
body title detail: Observer status for the Global Green Growth Institute in the General Assembly
body text: The General Assembly, Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Global Green Growth Institute, 1. Decides to invite the Global Green Growth Institute to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer; 2. Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution. 13-50870 i 111013 CA NY AAA
